title: Unexpected error while logging in
body: It's been doing this all day. I put my login information in and it says this. I've tried running as administrator and uninstalling-reinstalling but it still does this. Any ideas as to what I could do?

replies.body: So apparently the issue WASN'T with the launcher; it was that I was using my IGN as my username. It should have said "invalid username" or something instead of 'an unexpected error occurred"

We've added messaging about this in a pinned thread, but this error might be happening due to an incorrect password or region.  If resetting your password doesn't work, reach out through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and an account specialist can help you directly.
My bad. I didn't realize there was a pinned thread. I'll try resetting my password.
